attributes.action: stop immigrant from entering UK, increase the police force on our streets and pull out our Men from Afganistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Surely funding the Pakistani goverment to train and secure their country is enough for Britains involvment in its progress.Please consider bringing our British men home, instead increasing the police force and improving the home office checks on new visitors to our country and re-interviewing those who claimed their passportd within the last 5years should be enough to secure the country within.spend the money inside and for our country.
